page.title: 02SANDOWN AIRPORT
page.content: At Sandown Airport there are about 34 light planes. The buildings around the airport are 4 hangers.Two are privately owned by {Richard Nobel the world land speed {record}holder.He designed,manufact- ured and tested the new plane called Super 2 which is very small,fast and is the quickest plane for its size. At the airport there is a cafe,flying club,control tower,flying school and toilets. Since"Pleasure Flights"have opened 2,000 people have been on them. The runways are all grass apart from one.It costs \ million pounds to change grass to tarmac. There have been more visiting planes at Sandown airport than any other in Britain.
